text: Peace is not only better than war, but infinitely more arduous.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
author: Virginia Woolf

text: You will find peace not by trying to escape your problems, but by confronting them courageously. You will find peace not in denial, but in victory.
author: J. Donald Walters

text: One does not need buildings, money, power, or status to practice the Art of Peace. Heaven is right where you are standing, and that is the place to train.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

text: War will never cease until babies begin to come into the world with larger cerebrums and smaller adrenal glands.
author: H. L. Mencken
